# Location and Max Temp

```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(medata, aes(x = medata$lon, y = medata$lat)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(colour = medata$tmax)) +
  xlab("Longitude") + ylab("Latitude") +
    scale_color_gradient("Max Annual Temp", na.value = "gray66")
  legend(x = 10, y = 10, legend = "Max Temp", col = "Zissou1")

ggplotly(p1)

```
